ValidationRule.description: If the job order type is "Custom Webinar Headers" or "Event Headers", status cannot change to Completed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK(Highlight_Color__c), OR( Job_Order_Type__c = "Custom Webinar Headers", Job_Order_Type__c = "Event Headers")&& ISPICKVAL( Status__c, "Completed"))
